Title: The_Barbarian_Sublimation

Sheldon: (There is banging at the door.)
You appear to have put your car key in the door lock, are you aware of that?
(Turns to return inside. One of the grocery bags Penny is holding falls to the floor spilling groceries.)
Would it be possible for you to do this a little more quietly?
Well that's not surprising. That Baldwin lock on your door uses traditional edge mounted cylinders, whereas the key for your Volkswagen uses a center cylinder system.
You're welcome. Point of inquiry, why did you put your car key in the door lock?
Well, the American Midwest was mostly settled by Scandinavian and Germanic peoples who, well they have a characteristic facial bone structure....
Well, actually, insects are a dietary staple in many cultures, they're almost pure protein.

I believe the condensation on your frozen foods weakened the structural integrity of the bag. But returning to your key conundrum, perhaps you should call a locksmith and have him open the door for you.
And you're frustrated because he phrased his reply in the form of a meaningless tautology?
(Reluctantly)
(Turns to go inside again.)
Just when I think I’ve gotten the hang of sarcasm.
(Sits in Sheldon’s place.)
The Conqueror.
AFK. I'm playing Age of Conan, an online multiplayer game set in the universe of Robert E. Howard's Conan the Barbarian.
Sheldor, back online.
AFK. Away from keyboard.
What does that stand for?
Yes, but what does it stand for?
Now just click on the enchanted boots to put them on.
Just click on them. Congratulations, you are now a level three warrior.
It doesn't matter, right now you're looking for treasure.
You're okay, if you run into crocodiles just kick them with your boots.
Well let's see, uh, she attempted to open her apartment with her car key, because her face is overly Midwestern, um, she hasn't had sex in six months, and she ate a fly.
Level three and she thinks she's rich! What a noob.
They make up a non-Newtonian fluid which is liquid, but solid under the percussive action of the speaker.
Do you have the enchanted sword?
You can't slay the guard captain with a bronze dagger, my Lord it's like the car key in your apartment door all over again.
Well, have you been to the Temple of Mithra?
(Takes laptop.)
You're going to have to learn to do these things for yourself, Penny.
There you go, one enchanted sword.
That girl needs to get a life.
Danger, danger.
You're in my bedroom.
People can't be in my bedroom.
I'm not wearing pajama bottoms.
I spilled grape juice.
I can't wear different pajamas, these are my Monday pajamas. Penny, people cannot be in my bedroom.
You were invited on a quest to the Black Castle?
Of course it's not, you're only a level 25, the Hungarians are just using you for dragon fodder.
(Off)

I realize that Dr Gablehauser but it is your job, as head of the department, to mediate all inter-departmental disputes. University policy manual chapter four, subsection two, mediation of inter-departmental disputes.
No she doesn't.
Here's the problem. I was clearly signed up to use the mainframe in Buckman 204, and Dr Winkle just wantonly ripped the sign-up sheet off the wall.
(His phone rings.)
God, no.

Oh yeah, well, you wouldn't even be nominated. Dr Gablehauser, I have a series of important multi-bit calculations and simulations to run. All she's doing is reducing irrelevant data and making a mock...
(Puts phone down)

Leonard, you have to do something about Penny. She is interfering with my sleep, she's interfering with my work, and if I had another significant aspect of my life, I'm sure she'd be interfering with that too.
Well, yes, but you're the one who said hello to her when she moved in. If you'd simply restrained yourself none of this would be happening.
I did. I told her, I texted her, I sent out a very emphatic twitter. I even changed my Facebook status to Sheldon Cooper wishes Penny would leave him alone. I don't know what else to do.
I don't know, but if you don't figure something out, I warn you I shall become very difficult to live with.
Yes.
Danger, danger.
Oh yeah, well your attempt at juvenilizing me by excluding me from the set of adult males.... oh, I'm too tired to do this.
She comes into my room. No-one's supposed to be in my room.

Hang on, Leonard, while I have no respect for Leslie as a scientist, or a human being for that matter, we have to concede her undeniable expertise in the interrelated fields of promiscuity and general sluttiness.
Some what? Oh, yes, some sexual intercourse.
(Leans over to a good looking man on a nearby table.)
Would you like to be?
Zip it pip it. Can I have your phone number?
There, problem solved.
Stay close to the wall. Avoid the mummies.
I must say, you're playing very well for a woman of 23?
(Cut to his screen, he is filling in an online dating profile.)
What happened to the rest of your group?
Frenzy stance.
So listen, would you describe your ideal vacation as a wild adventure to unknown lands, or staying at home curled up with a good book?
These are market research questions. I'm filling out the online registration for your game.
Drink a healing potion.
You're welcome. Anyhow, on a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being always initiated by him, and 5 being always initiated by you, how do you prefer your sexual encounters to begin?
Oh yes, it's quite extensive. But if we complete it, we get a free expansion pack, 75 additional quests.
Good to know. Big old five.
Leonard, this is Tom.
Yes, you were very clear, as was everyone else at the table. Tom, however, has been chosen by science as a suitable mate for Penny.
Well, what passes for science on dating sites. They claim to use heuristic algorithms, but it may well be hokum.
No, of course not. No, I used trickery and deceit.
Tom is a paramedic with the fire department, but he's going to med school at night, uh, he likes the outdoors, and, uh, strong women who initiate sex.
I'm surprised you struck out with Penny. Apparently she's a big old five.
Oh, good, you got my note. Penny, I'd like you to meet Tom, uh, Penny, this is Tom, Tom, may I present Penny.
Can we talk about this later.
But wouldn't you prefer to socialize with Tom, who is a sexually passive outdoorsman.
Penny: Yes, I can't get my stupid door open.
Yeah!
Dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit.
I can't get the damned key out.
Thank you, Sheldon.

Why? I'll tell you why. Because today I had an audition, it took me two hours to get there, I waited an hour for my turn, and before I could even start they told me I looked too Midwest for the part. Too Midwest? What the hell does that even mean?

I know what it means, Sheldon! God, you know, I have been in L.A. for almost two years now, and I haven't got a single acting job, I have accomplished nothing, haven't gotten a raise at work, haven't even had sex in six months, and just now when I was walking up those stairs a fly flew in my mouth and I ate it.
(Picking up the bag she has just repacked, whereupon the bottom falls out and the groceries fall to the floor again)
I did, and he said he'll get here when he gets here.
(Bursts into tears.)
No Sheldon, I'd rather sit on this freezing cold floor sobbing like a three-year-old.
(Stomps into apartment.)
Sheldor?
What are you doing?
Oh.
What's AFK?
OIC.
Oh, I see?
Oh, I don't know. Can I see them in another color?
Leonard, guess what, I'm a level three warrior.
Yeah yeah yeah, shhh!
Uh-huh, yeah, do I stay in the jungle or go towards the beach?
(Leonard motions for Sheldon to talk in the kitchen.)
Oh my God, a treasure chest, I'm rich!
(Entering, carrying a laptop)
Yeah, okay. Listen, I need to talk to Sheldon.
Okay, look, I bought the game, and I’ve been exploring the Island of Tordage but I can't figure out how to get past the guard captain.
No, no, I’ve a bronze dagger.
Alright, alright, how do I get the sword?
Is that the place on the hill with the weird priests in front of it?
Thank you, I really appreciate this.
Don't patronize me, just get the sword.
(Leaves)
(Whispering)
No danger, look, it's just me, Penny, look, I got to level 25 and reached Purple Lotus Swamp, right?
Yeah. Leonard gave me an emergency key.
Okay, well can we go talk in the living room?
Why not?
Well, wear different pajamas.
Okay, just tell me, is it too soon to join a quest to the Black Castle?
Yeah, yeah, by some guys in Budapest, I'm just not sure it's the right move for my character.
Really? Boy, you'd think you could trust a horde of Hungarian barbarians.
(Off)
No, Fritz, I need you on my flank. No, I don't know German. Flankenzie, flankenzie!
Busy.
I don't work on Mondays.
Uh, Queen Penelope AFK. What?
Yeah, get to the point, I'm about to level up here.
Yeah, jabber jabber jabber, okay boys, Queen Penelope's back online.
(Pulling cheeto out of hair)
Okay, I'm at the gate to the Treasury of the Ancients, I'm going in.
Got it.
Oh, here come the mummies, which spell do I use? The hateful strike, or the frenzy stance?
I dumped them, they're a bunch of wussies.
Frenzy, frenzy, frenzy, frenzy, frenzy!
What?
Oh, okay, wild adventure. Oh, frenzy stance isn't working, die you undead mummy, die!
Thank you.
That's on the registration?
Ooh, awesome, okay, I totally like to initiate I'm a big old five.
(Entering, looking ratty in baggy clothes and with her hair unwashed)
Yeah, Hi, listen, as long as I'm here, I'm on a quest with a bunch of noobs, they don't know what they're doing, we’ve got one assassin, three spellcasters and no tank.
No, no, no, no, I need you now.
Whatever, I'll figure it out myself.
(Closes laptop and throws it away.)
Scene: The stairwell. Leonard arrives and sees the spilled groceries. A cat is lapping at a spilled pot of ice-cream. Cut to inside. Penny now has the laptop, Sheldon is instructing her.
The apartment. Raj is pouring a white liquid into the main dish of a stereo speaker covered in cling film.
(Leonard turns on stereo with a remote. Rhythmic bass-heavy music plays. The liquid begins dancing on the speaker.)
Sheldon's bedroom. There is a knock on the door. Penny enters.
Cut to Leonard, exiting his bedroom.
Penny's apartment. She is on her laptop and talking into a headset.
Same – later. Penny is attacking a multi-headed monster with a sword on the screen.A muscular warrior in a cape walks onto the screen.
Penny's flat. Penny is on her laptop. Everything around her is littered with empty food packaging and red bull cans. She burps loudly. Sheldon is sitting on the sofa.
The apartment. Leonard enters. There is a strange man sitting on the sofa.
Inside the game. Penny-warrior is standing next to a battle horse.
Leonard: What's going on?
Great, you know there are groceries outside of your apartment?
I only bring it up because your ice-cream is melting and it's starting to attract wildlife.
Want to catch me up?
Uh-huh. Seriously, six months?
Hey, check it out, it's just corn starch and water.
Beats me. They were playing all last night too.
No, that's Marcie. Peppermint Patty's just athletic.
(Knocking on door)
Why should I do something, you're the one who introduced her to online gaming.
Why don't you just tell her to leave you alone.
Well, what am I supposed to do?
You mean, up until now we’ve been experiencing the happy funtime Sheldon?
I'll go talk to her.
(Knocking and entering)
Yeah, I see that. Shouldn't you be at work?
It's Thursday. Listen, Penny.
Okay, um, here's the thing, um, sometimes people, good people, you know, they start playing these games and they find themselves through no fault of their own, you know, kind of, addicted.
Well, i-i-i-it's just if a person doesn't have a sense of achievement in their real life it's easy to lose themselves in a virtual world where they get a false sense of accomplishment.
Penny, you've got cheetos in your hair.
Wow.
Penny's been keeping him up at night.
She's gotten really hooked on Age of Conan, she's playing non-stop.
Sheldon, wake up.
That's not what she's doing, Leslie, she's just trying to shore up her self esteem, it has nothing to do with sex.
Leslie, you are way off base here.
Excuse me, this whole idea is insane.
Sheldon...
Hello.
Hi Tom. Sheldon? Didn't I explain to you about your little mistake in the cafeteria?
Chosen by science?
You got Penny to sign up for online dating?
This is bad.
Really, really bad.
They never do.
Raj: It's like some kind of weird comic book crossover.
I always thought Peppermint Patty was a lesbian?
Ah, yes, online gaming addiction. There's nothing worse than having that multi-player monkey on your back.
Howard: That's what makes it get all funky.
Like if Hulk were dating Peppermint Patty.
Me too. But probably in a different way.
I do that too. But probably in a different way.
(Puts up hand for a hand slap.)
Gablehauser: People, I am very busy today.
Fine. Dr Winkle, what colorful name did you call Dr Cooper this time?
You need to get that Dr Cooper?
Leslie: It wasn't even an official sign-up sheet. He printed it himself and he put his name down in every slot for the next six months.
Well don't turn it off, you might miss your call from the Nobel committee letting you know you've been nominated as dumbass laureate of the year.
Right, I heard you've been pulling all nighters with middle-earth Barbie.
Well, I would postulate that she's escaping into the online world to compensate for her sexual frustration.
Everything has to do with sex.
Thank you. My point is that Tinkerbell just needs to get her some.
Warrior: Hey Penny, it's me again, Leonard.
It is I, Sir Howard of Wolowitz. Can I interest you in an afternoon of spirited questing, followed by a flagon of ale at yon virtual tavern?
Leonard-warrior: Yeah, I know, I'm just a little concerned about you.
Tom: Bye, Penny. I'm sorry, dude, she didn't look anything like her picture.

Let her rip.

Yeah, okay. Listen, I need to talk to Sheldon.
(After Raj whispers in his ear)
Okay, look, I bought the game, and I’ve been exploring the Island of Tordage but I can't figure out how to get past the guard captain.
Do you have the enchanted sword?
No, no, I’ve a bronze dagger.
You can't slay the guard captain with a bronze dagger, my Lord it's like the car key in your apartment door all over again.
Alright, alright, how do I get the sword?
Well, have you been to the Temple of Mithra?
Is that the place on the hill with the weird priests in front of it?
(Takes laptop.)
Thank you, I really appreciate this.
You're going to have to learn to do these things for yourself, Penny.
Don't patronize me, just get the sword.
What the frak?
Beats me. They were playing all last night too.
It's like some kind of weird comic book crossover.

I always thought Peppermint Patty was a lesbian?
No, that's Marcie. Peppermint Patty's just athletic.
There you go, one enchanted sword.
(Leaves)
That girl needs to get a life.
Sheldon's bedroom. There is a knock on the door. Penny enters.
(Whispering)
Danger, danger.
No danger, look, it's just me, Penny, look, I got to level 25 and reached Purple Lotus Swamp, right?
You're in my bedroom.
Yeah. Leonard gave me an emergency key.
People can't be in my bedroom.
Okay, well can we go talk in the living room?
I'm not wearing pajama bottoms.

Well, wear different pajamas.
I can't wear different pajamas, these are my Monday pajamas. Penny, people cannot be in my bedroom.
Okay, just tell me, is it too soon to join a quest to the Black Castle?
You were invited on a quest to the Black Castle?
Yeah, yeah, by some guys in Budapest, I'm just not sure it's the right move for my character.
Of course it's not, you're only a level 25, the Hungarians are just using you for dragon fodder.

(Off)

People, I am very busy today.

I realize that Dr Gablehauser but it is your job, as head of the department, to mediate all inter-departmental disputes. University policy manual chapter four, subsection two, mediation of inter-departmental disputes.
Fine. Dr Winkle, what colorful name did you call Dr Cooper this time?
Dr Dumbass.
Dr Cooper, Dr Winkle apologizes.
No she doesn't.
No I don't.
Here's the problem. I was clearly signed up to use the mainframe in Buckman 204, and Dr Winkle just wantonly ripped the sign-up sheet off the wall.

You need to get that Dr Cooper?
God, no.

I did. I told her, I texted her, I sent out a very emphatic twitter. I even changed my Facebook status to Sheldon Cooper wishes Penny would leave him alone. I don't know what else to do.
